conversation.content: As a User, I want to confirm policyholder identity so that the claim process can begin accurately.

As a Claims Adjuster, I want to implement a multi-factor authentication system for high-value claims processing that integrates with our existing Pega platform, ensures compliance with industry regulations, provides a user-friendly experience, and allows for detailed audit trails, so that we can enhance security, reduce fraud, and streamline the claims verification process for both adjusters and policyholders.
